input.sentences: my brother had a great idea to throw a pirate themed party .
he really got into the spirit .
his girlfriend played along | and brought her brother .
i was n't so into it | but my boyfriend was .
i got the tiara | and kept it even though it was a dig at my party pooper attitude . it was still a fun party .
output.sentences: For Halloween my friends and I threw a pirate themed party.
Bob played every game and even found a spirit to sword fight.
Jim brought his new girlfriend who had no problem fitting in and played along.
As usual, Jenny had a new boyfriend that week but a least he dressed up.
Jenny may have changed outfits but she was still the biggest party pooper of the night opting for a tiara instead of a pirate costume.
